title: Travel Iconography
content:
Hi!

I am designing a Powerpoint presentation on a luxury hotel and resorts brand. I would like to add small icons to suggest aspects of travel, ie.

food and drink, plane, bed (accommodation), shopping, business meeting, spa etc.

I was going to draw them straight into Illustrator, but does anyone know any fonts that would be good for this? They must be a font and not 3D icons etc as I need to customise the colours.

I am looking for clear and simple travel signage similar to Swiss style or some quirky icons would be good.

Thank you!
author: newbie_chez

comments.content: I think Ricardo Santos work will help you... [http://www.vanarchiv.com/van-dingbats.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018031033/http:/www.vanarchiv.com/van-dingbats.html "http://www.vanarchiv.com/van-dingbats.html")

YES! This is what I am looking for. Thanks!

Any alternatives please post! But these are great for a start.

I think Hoefler & Frere-Jones have a really good and complete work to. You can search..... [http://www.typography.com/home/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018031033/http:/www.typography.com/home/index.php "http://www.typography.com/home/index.php")
